data.name: Renai Karichaimashita: Koikari - Love For Hire
data.detailed_description:
"Renai Karichaimashita: Koikari - Love For Hire" is a Japanese-style visual novel produced by ASa Project, a Japanese developer of romance visual novels.



STORY

"Please go out with me!"
"I want you to be my 'paramour.'"
"Okay, here's your friend fee."
"Why'd it turn out like this?"

Shinkai Yuki is a siscon.
Due to family circumstances, Yuki has only one belief: money will make his little sister happy.
And thus, he works part-time jobs late into the night.

His original plan was to start working full-time immediately after graduation, but one day, his little sister tells him that if he won't go to university, then she won't either.
But Yuki can't let her suffer like that.

Suddenly tasked with earning money for university tuition, Yuki signs up to be a "rental temp worker."

You're sure to find a new you!
Recruiting rental temp workers!

Sign Up!
Incredibly high pay! Perfect for students!
Fun, fulfilling, hands-on work☆

He thinks it sounds sketchy as hell,
but because he's out of options, he starts taking up temp work.

For whatever reason, a classmate requests him as a pretend boyfriend...
He also gets requests to be a paramour, a friend, and even an Onii-chan?!
These false relationships begin with money, but how will they end?!

Key Features


● Funny and quirky lovestories
● A dorky main character
● Beautiful and colorful artstyle
● Five adorable and cute heroine routes
● Funny side characters and hilarious dialogue

data.short_description: Due to family circumstances, Yuki has only one belief: money will make his little sister happy. And thus, he works part-time jobs late into the night. His plan is to start working full-time after graduation, but his little sister tells him that if he won't go to university, then she won't either.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz or above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Renai Karichaimashita: Koikari - Love For Hire

highlighted.name: Tsu for the Price of One

content_descriptors.notes:
Adult content includes a few illustrations with veiled nudity, kissing, use of alcohol, and dialogue that contains sexual jokes and implications.
Characters enter a sexual relationship that is not shown on screen, but acts of which are brought up in conversation.
Also, every appearing character is over 18 years old.
